ygData.msgSnippet: ... spells (Infectious cloud, Spirit Armor, and Augment Death) are ... He s double checking these. ... to make them more viable in the low/mid-levels. Would
ygData.messageBody:
> I spoke with our magic system designer and he does not believe those
spells (Infectious cloud, Spirit Armor, and Augment Death) are
> supposed to be for Shadow Knights and thus might be a data entry error.
He's double checking these.
>
> I'm also talking to him about possibly changing some other aspects of SKs
to make them more viable in the low/mid-levels.

Would you also ask him about Boil Blood? Or any of the other spells we had
taken away from us way back in the day? =( I don't mean to be rude, but I
heartily disagree that you guys need to worry about the low/mid levels when
the SK never even seems to peak at the *high* levels. Is some new and/or
better high level spells asking too much? And what's with the pets? Gah,
what a joke! Here's an idea, how about switching out all our useless pet
spells and replacing them with the equivalent lifetap spells for those
levels? That would be a great deal more helpful than those pets that do
nothing but get yer arse into trouble.

> One problem that SKs face -- and one of the reasons that they are so
difficult to play -- is that they were tuned on the assumption
> that you would be playing an Ogre or Troll. As such, human SKs are quite
possibly the second most difficult class/race combination
> in the game to play (after Erudite Paladin).

The human SKs? At least they don't have the staggering exp penalty that dark
elves do. As for being the most difficult (or second-most) class combo, why
is it that there are 3 level 50 human SKs on Fennin Ro and only 1 level 50
dark elf SK?

Moral of the story, I picked a dark elf SK and not a troll/ogre SK because I
was a warrior before, and I wanted to take *full* advantage of my new
spell-chucking abilities (as only a dark elf can, compared to
human/ogre/troll). Now all I hear about as I get higher and higher is the
*lack* of useful spells! I'm 38 now, and I'll be 50 sooner rather than
later, and the last thing I want is to then have to start over AGAIN. Of
course, as soon as I dropped the warrior, yall go and fix 'em... sheesh...

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elf SK (38)
Fennin Ro

PS: Sorry if this is nothing but a rant, but tonight was just not a good
night. =\
